field.name: title
field.label: Group Name:
field.description: Name of this group so it is easier to locate in this list.

field.name: category
field.label: Categories:
field.description: Select one or more categories to which to send notifications to this group's Address(es).

field.name: recipients
field.label: Recipients:
field.description: Select whether to email the article author, the address below, both, or neither (disabled).

field.name: address
field.label: To:
field.description: Email address(es) to receive notifications for this group's Categories. Comma-separated if multiple.

field.name: email_subject
field.label: Subject:
field.description: (optional) Text for email subject. If omitted default is [SITE] [CATEGORY] [ACTION].

field.name: controloptions
field.label: Control Options
field.description: Flip these switches to control this group.

field.name: enabled
field.label: Group Enabled In:
field.description: Select whether to send email on front or back end article modifications, both, or neither (disabled).

field.name: format
field.label: Email Format:
field.description: Prepare the content as HTML or Plain Text. Enter your subscription group template in the appropriate box on the right.

field.name: prepare_content
field.label: Prepare Content:
field.description: Optionally prepare the content with the Joomla content plugins. Only works with HTML format.

field.name: htmltemplate
field.label: HTML Template:
field.description: Enter the HTML layout for messages sent to this group's Address. Insert tags where you want parts of the article to appear.

field.name: texttemplate
field.label: Text Template:
field.description: Enter the plain text layout for messages sent to this group's Address. Insert tags where you want parts of the article to appear.
